5.11 The STREAMS module

<byte>

Type

Summary

A type representing limited integers in the range 0 to 255 inclusive.

Supertypes

<integer>

Init-keywords

None.

Library

io

Module

streams

Description

A type representing limited integers in the range 0 to 255 inclusive.

Operations

type-for-file-stream

System and I/O Reference - 31 MAR 2000
